[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-telemetry/src/sender.rs] [Constant: TELEMETRY_SERVICE_TOTAL_RETRY_DURATION_SECS] [Retry duration] 10 second total retry - can this cause validator operations to stall during telemetry service outages? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-telemetry/src/sender.rs] [Constant: DEFAULT_VERSION_PATH_BASE] [Version path] Hardcoded to 'api/v1/' - if API version changes, can outdated clients send telemetry to wrong endpoints or fail? (Low)
